item.description: The Vermont Challenge LLC, in conjunction with Vermont Department of Tourism and Marketing (VDTM) and the Chambers of Commerce of Manchester and the Mountains, Okemo/Ludlow and Killington, presents The Vermont Challenge. When The Vermont Challenge runs from August 15-19, 2012 3 Great Ride Options to choose from: The Grand Challenge - 8/15-19/2102 The Grand Challenge begins with registration at Stratton on the evening of Wednesday, August 15th and then loops back down and finishes back at Stratton on Sunday, August 19th. The Weekend Challenge - 8/16-19/2012 The Weekend Challenge begins Thursday evening with registration in Manchester and finishes back at Stratton for bus transportation back to Manchester or you have the option to ride down the ridge for a fast downhill finish! Both the Grand and Weekend Challenge riders have the option of completing a century on Saturday. The One-Day Legendary Gap Century or Half-Century option - 8/18/2012 The one-day Legendary Gap Century begins and ends at Okemo on Saturday 8/18 and crosses the legendary Middlebury Gap. If you enjoy the Challenge of the Grand Fondo's™ or the Harpoon B2B™ you'll love the Gap Century Challenge! Not ready to ride a full century? No problem, simply choose the Half Century option, which leaves Okemo and heads for the beautiful picture post-card village of Woodstock before looping through gorgeous roads along the Black River as it returns to Okemo to enjoy the festivities at the Jackson Gore Resort. We encourage one-day Gap Century riders to arrive Friday evening and choose from a variety of Lodging options at Okemo or the Town of Ludlow. Registration opens Friday evening and they'll be a party that evening for all guests!! Register early and save!! Sign-up before 3/15/12 and save $30. Prices increase thereafter by $20 each month until June so register early! Team Registration: Register your team of eight or more and each team member receives a discount of $30 off individual registration rates. www.vtchallenge.com
